get.summary: Gets the list of the acquired phone numbers.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: A language-locale pairing which will be used to localise the names of countries

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: An optional parameter for how many entries to skip, for pagination purposes.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: An optional parameter for how many entries to return, for pagination purposes.

post.summary: Gets a list of the supported area codes

parameters.name: locationType
parameters.description: The type of location information required by the plan.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: The ISO 3166-2 country code

parameters.name: phonePlanId
parameters.description: The plan id from which to search area codes.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Location options for when location type is selection.

get.summary: Get capabilities by capabilities update id.

post.summary: Adds or removes phone number capabilities

get.summary: Gets a list of supported countries

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: A language-locale pairing which will be used to localise the names of countries

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: An optional parameter for how many entries to skip, for pagination purposes.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: An optional parameter for how many entries to return, for pagination purposes.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The phone number whose configuration is to be fetched

patch.summary: Endpoint for configuring a pstn number

patch.summary: Endpoint for unconfiguring a pstn number by removing the configuration

parameters.description: The phone number to un-configure

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: An optional parameter for how many entries to skip, for pagination purposes.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: An optional parameter for how many entries to return, for pagination purposes.

parameters.name: take

get.summary: Gets a list of all releases

parameters.description: An optional parameter for how many entries to return, for pagination purposes.

parameters.name: searchId
parameters.description: The search id to be searched for

get.summary: Gets a list of all searches

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: An optional parameter for how many entries to skip, for pagination purposes.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: An optional parameter for how many entries to return, for pagination purposes.

post.summary: Cancels the search. This means existing numbers in the search will be made available.

parameters.name: searchId
parameters.description: The search id to be canceled

parameters.name: searchId
parameters.description: The search id to be purchased
